subtitle: This can be served by itself or spooned over a compote of fruit. It blends particularly well with cherries.

method.text: Put the egg yolks and sugar into a basin. Whisk, ideally with a hand mixer, for 5 min until very thick and creamy.
Gradually whisk in the wine, a little at a time.
Place the basin over a pan of hot, but not boiling, water. Continue to whisk for 3-5 min until the mixture is thick and fluffy.
Serve while warm with sponge fingers.

title: Zabaglione
